含义.解释: The character '在' primarily means 'at', 'in', or 'exist'. It is used to indicate location, presence, or the state of being.

字形.描述: The character '在' consists of two parts: the top part '𠂉' (a variant of '才') and the bottom part '土' (earth). The structure symbolizes existence or presence on earth.

字源.解释: The character '在' originated from ancient oracle bone inscriptions, depicting the concept of existence or presence. Over time, its form evolved to the current simplified structure.

列表: Once upon a time, a wise man said, 'To be or not to be, that is the question.' This reflects the essence of '在', which signifies existence.
A student asked his teacher, 'Where is happiness?' The teacher replied, 'Happiness is in the present moment, in being '在' the here and now.'
《静夜思》 - 李白: '床前明月光，疑是地上霜。举头望明月，低头思故乡。' (The moonlight is at the front of my bed, I suspect it is frost on the ground. I raise my head to look at the bright moon, then lower it, thinking of home.)
《登鹳雀楼》 - 王之涣: '白日依山尽，黄河入海流。欲穷千里目，更上一层楼。' (The sun sets behind the mountains, the Yellow River flows into the sea. To extend the view a thousand miles, ascend yet one more floor.)
